name: bj-abbid
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))

-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
